title: Have babies for Russia: Putin presses women to embrace patriotism over feminism
content: Women in Russia are being told to forgo education and careers to prioritize having many children, even as Putin’s war in Ukraine drains men from the workforce.
summary: Women in Russia are being told to forgo education and careers to prioritize having many children, even as Putin’s war in Ukraine drains men from the workforce.

title: Blinken, Austin detail new U.S. security commitments for Philippines
content: The defense cooperation plans come as Manila seeks to bolster its ability to resist pressure from an increasingly assertive Chinese military in the South China Sea.
summary: The defense cooperation plans come as Manila seeks to bolster its ability to resist pressure from an increasingly assertive Chinese military in the South China Sea.

title: Landslides, heavy rains kill at least 56 in south India’s Kerala state
content: Downpours caused landslides in the hilly Wayanad district. Authorities fear the toll will rise as bad weather complicates search and rescue efforts.
summary: Downpours caused landslides in the hilly Wayanad district. Authorities fear the toll will rise as bad weather complicates search and rescue efforts.

title: The Paris Olympics touted climate-friendly food. Athletes demanded more meat.
content: What does a city proud of its culinary reputation, but also focused on the Olympics’ carbon footprint, serve to thousands of athletes seeking peak performance?
summary: What does a city proud of its culinary reputation, but also focused on the Olympics’ carbon footprint, serve to thousands of athletes seeking peak performance?

title: Images of a starving Palestinian boy went viral. The attention saved him.
content: Six-year-old Fadi al-Zant, a starving Palestinian boy, was saved by a viral photo during the Gaza hunger crisis.
summary: Six-year-old Fadi al-Zant, a starving Palestinian boy, was saved by a viral photo during the Gaza hunger crisis.

title: World leaders, ordinary Venezuelans protest Maduro’s reelection claim
content: Authoritarian socialist Nicolás Maduro claimed reelection despite exit polling that showed challenger Edmundo González captured twice as many votes. The United States and others called for transparency.
summary: Authoritarian socialist Nicolás Maduro claimed reelection despite exit polling that showed challenger Edmundo González captured twice as many votes. The United States and others called for transparency.

title: Iran seeks to undermine Trump ahead of election, officials signal
content: The U.S. intelligence community says Iran probably views a Trump victory in November as worse for Tehran’s already poor relations with Washington.
summary: The U.S. intelligence community says Iran probably views a Trump victory in November as worse for Tehran’s already poor relations with Washington.

title: Region braces for Netanyahu to decide Israeli response to Golan Heights strike
content: As tensions rise after a deadly rocket attack launched from Lebanon, diplomats are urging restraint to prevent the war in Gaza from spilling into a regional conflict.
summary: As tensions rise after a deadly rocket attack launched from Lebanon, diplomats are urging restraint to prevent the war in Gaza from spilling into a regional conflict.

title: Palestinians recount deadly abuse in Israeli prisons: ‘It is Guantánamo’
content: The Post spoke to former Palestinian prisoners and lawyers and reviewed autopsy reports, revealing rampant violence and deprivation in Israel’s prison system.
summary: The Post spoke to former Palestinian prisoners and lawyers and reviewed autopsy reports, revealing rampant violence and deprivation in Israel’s prison system.

title: Far right in uproar after Israel detains reservists over Gaza detainee abuse
content: Far-right demonstrators broke into Israel’s Sde Teiman base to protest the detentions of guards.
summary: Far-right demonstrators broke into Israel’s Sde Teiman base to protest the detentions of guards.

title: Two children killed, others critically wounded in mass stabbing in British seaside town
content: Police said they have detained a teenage boy in the stabbings in the town of Southport.
summary: Police said they have detained a teenage boy in the stabbings in the town of Southport.

title: Simone Biles urged her to endure. Now she’s Biles’s top challenger.
content: The reigning world champion all-rounder and her Brazilian runner-up have formed a mutual admiration society.
summary: The reigning world champion all-rounder and her Brazilian runner-up have formed a mutual admiration society.

title: We reported for months on changes sweeping Russia. Here’s what we found.
content: “Russia, Remastered” reveals how Vladimir Putin is harnessing the war in Ukraine to transform his own country and fulfill his vision of a restored superpower.
summary: “Russia, Remastered” reveals how Vladimir Putin is harnessing the war in Ukraine to transform his own country and fulfill his vision of a restored superpower.

title: Artists say Putin’s push for patriotism is killing Russian culture
content: Russian musicians, actors, writers and others who oppose the war are being exiled, while Putin compels artists remaining in Russia to demonstrate allegiance.
summary: Russian musicians, actors, writers and others who oppose the war are being exiled, while Putin compels artists remaining in Russia to demonstrate allegiance.

title: Migrants from China ‘walk the line’ to U.S. border, testing Biden and Xi
content: The Post explores the largest wave of illegal U.S. border crossings by Chinese immigrants in history — part of a wider influx involving migrants from other nations.
summary: The Post explores the largest wave of illegal U.S. border crossings by Chinese immigrants in history — part of a wider influx involving migrants from other nations.

title: Maduro declared winner of disputed Venezuelan election
content: The opposition, which had warned of the potential for fraud, was expected to challenge the result.
summary: The opposition, which had warned of the potential for fraud, was expected to challenge the result.

title: In Sudan’s catastrophe, food runs out as guns flow freely
content: The effects of the war in Sudan can be measured in superlatives: the world’s biggest internal displacement crisis, largest education crisis and biggest hunger crisis.
summary: The effects of the war in Sudan can be measured in superlatives: the world’s biggest internal displacement crisis, largest education crisis and biggest hunger crisis.

title: Warring parties in Sudan accused of carrying out rapes
content: Allegations by Human Rights Watch that captive women were repeatedly raped jibes with Post reporting from inside Sudan. The RSF said to be the main perpetrator.
summary: Allegations by Human Rights Watch that captive women were repeatedly raped jibes with Post reporting from inside Sudan. The RSF said to be the main perpetrator.

title: Paris Olympics organizers sorry for Last Supper at Opening Ceremonies
content: The tableau included a woman in the role of Jesus and drag queens and gay icons as disciples. It was crashed by a man in blue as Dionysus, the Greek god of revelry.
summary: The tableau included a woman in the role of Jesus and drag queens and gay icons as disciples. It was crashed by a man in blue as Dionysus, the Greek god of revelry.

title: Israel strikes deep in Lebanon after rocket attack, stoking fear of wider war
content: Israel had promised revenge for a rocket strike from Lebanon that killed 12 in the Golan Heights town of Majdal Shams. Hezbollah denied responsibility.
summary: Israel had promised revenge for a rocket strike from Lebanon that killed 12 in the Golan Heights town of Majdal Shams. Hezbollah denied responsibility.

title: Trump vs. Biden on immigration: 12 charts comparing U.S. border security
content: Here are 12 charts showing the state of the United States immigration system and the southern border under Biden vs. Trump.
summary: Here are 12 charts showing the state of the United States immigration system and the southern border under Biden vs. Trump.
